skills.name: Absolute Zero
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 25s] Transform ionic energy into a frigid blast, freezing enemies along the way and dealing 999 Ice DMG every 0.9s for 5.00s.

skills.name: Frigid Winter
skills.description: Hits against enemies gain 50 Ice DMG, and attacks against enemies who are frozen or have reduced Move Speed gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier.
